On Darwin Sunday, I heard a presentation by an architect at my 
 Unitarian church about evolution & intelligent design. I figured 
 that if anyone knew about the true nature of intelligent design, it 
 would be an architect. Curiously enough, he started out by 
 mentioining examples of bad design, such as an uncomfortable chair. 
 Even the best of architects & engineers come up with imperfect 
 designs, just like the imperfect design of our vertebral column, 
 prone to slipped discs and scoliosis trying to support the whole 
 weight of our bodies in a vertical line. why is this? 
 
 It's not that designers, in general, are stupid. It has more to do 
 with the fact that virtually no one ever completely designs anything 
 from scratch as a totally original creation complete in its mature 
 form right off the bat. All human designs evolve from preceding 
 designs in an incremental fashion, each new "creation" adding to the 
 previous one (unless it's an Edsel). This under reported fact of 
 human engineering puts the lie to ID arguments that rely heavily on 
 examples of human design. 
 
 Bill Gates did not "create" microsoft windows in its mature form all 
 by himself without precursors. Ford Motor Company does not come up 
 with each new model from scratch without refering to countless 
 previous generations going all the way back to the Model-T. Design 
 is always a collective project and it always EVOLVES! This is what 
 is so absurd about the "argument from design", which itself has 
 EVOLVED from Paley to Behe to Dembski, using human artifacts (such 
 as the watch) which have evolved (from sundial to Timex) ... 
 Evolution by Design ... 
 
 By the same token, the "designs" we see in organisms have all the 
 hallmarks of evolutionary precursors ... swim bladders to lungs ... 
 spirochaete to flagellum ... Where is the intelligent agent in all 
 this? In a way, it is all of us and all other organisms that ever 
 lived, forming ecological relationships with eachother and 
 coeveolving as a result of those relationships. That's where the 
 real intelligence seems to be IMHO. The relationship between 
 neurons in our brains, or microchips in a computer 
 are all examples of designing intelligence. So, that is why 
 you can't talk about design in the absence of evolution ... 
 EVOLUTION BY DESIGN ...

O now come on, we all know that Mt. Rushmore didn't evolve from little statues of the president and the face on Mars didn't evolve from carvings of monkey martian faces. Just another evolutionist trying to steer the youth of this nation from the truth of His Noodly Goodness. We are all His creatures, even the Presidents and Martian Monkeys.
